Package myfuel.Tools

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnalysticSystem
    This class will has a Static Method that will provide the ratings as needed
    BackMainMenu
    This class has a method that will activate the backToMenu from specific GUIActions object
    CalcPrice
    This class has static methods that calculate all orders total price(according to promotions and sale model).
    CarFuelProgress
    This class simulate fuel progress by Thread execute.
    ClockPane
    User Interface for showing the current Date & Hour
    DateIgnoreComparator
    This class will be used as a comparator between 2 Date Objects only by their time
    MailThread
    Mail Thread Class, using the static class SendMailTLS for sending one mail with the specific address,content and subject.
    SendMailTLS
    This class using JavaMail API for sending mail .
    TimeIgnoringComparator
    This class will be used as a comparator of 2 Date Objects by considering only their date
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ReportEnum
    Will differ between the types of the reports
    RoleEnum
    will differ between the type of Roles at MyFuel Company
